bwwExcerpt: "It also is tough to play in the round. Or so, at least, it seems at Circle in the Square. Designer Derek McLane has the Keller's furniture stored up in the air, on wires. That idea mostly seems to cause everyone problems: the parameters of neither the Keller house nor Annie and Helen's treehouse ever seem clear.
